website_summaries.verdict: Lavishly detailed and fashionable women's snow boots comfortable enough for all-day wear. Has a side zipper for easy removal.
pros: Blend of durable leather and fabric
Lightweight and comfortable boots that bring the durability of a work boot to a dressier and more attractive full size boot
Great traction is an added bonus
cons: Best to buy a half-size up for better fit with socks

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boot for Chicago winters
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow foot (no such boot exists) so I need to be able to lace up to get a boot to fit me. I've had Bare Traps before and been happy but I needed a taller boot. This is excellent, waterproof, warm. It has a side zipper once the laces are customized. However, the cuff at the top is solid so the zipper is underneath it. It's a little weird but not difficult to get used to. The traction is good (important to me with my bad hip and general clumsiness in snow.) I'm still wearing a pair of BareTraps boots that's about 8 years old. This appears to be just as well made. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I have them in 4 different colors. They are warm and comfortable to wear. I have received many compliments and people ask where I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Youatt

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice boots, but I'm surprised by the reviews of ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice boots, but I'm surprised by the reviews of them being comfortable enough to wear all day. They're not comfortable at all. About half an hour is all I can stand to have them on. They're rather stiff and a little on the heavy side also. They're like fancy hiking boots. But, they are well made, and stylish. I just can't see spending that much money on something I can't wear very long. They are being returned.
customer_reviews.author: d hunter

customer_reviews.title: It is so warm!  And easy to put on.
customer_reviews.text: I've worn this boot for about a month now. It is warm, easy to put on and just a great boot. Sometimes boots are hard to put on, but due to the side zipper this is no problem. If you need arch support, use inserts since this boot does not offer much support. I bought a size larger than my shoe size so I an wear heavy socks inside. This boot looks great and feels even better. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Great little boot and comfortable- feet kept warm
customer_reviews.text: I am a 6 1/2 but got these in 6 and they fit well. They were really comfortable. I wore them to Colorado and walked around for over 8 hours with no issue and my feet stayed warm in 20 degree weather with a warm sock. Great little boot.
customer_reviews.author: studio95

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the boat and the price !!
customer_reviews.text: These do not have a lot of arch support, but I put my insole in and I am very happy with this boot !! I am going to get them in black also !!
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and don't make me look like a duck
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these BareTraps Satin Snow Boot in Mud color! I wear either a 6 or 6.5 ordered a 6 and my toes are right at the tip, but I've worn them with thick socks and they are so comfortable and warm. Can't wait to wear them on my trip to Aspen in March.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable winter boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! I can wear them all day- so comfy and warm:) I do wish they unzipped completely, it can be a bit tricky getting them on. Otherwise, a great buy and very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amy R.

customer_reviews.title: Loved the boot it just didn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: I have bought quite a few pairs of Baretrap boot ... this bare was an 8 1/2 but I would have needed a 9. Of course I couldn’t find them in another size. Overall great boots.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The boots are comfortable and keep your feet warm. They are true to size. I like it that the toe box is roomy enough to wear the boots with thicker socks.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, and warm
customer_reviews.text: These are the cutiest boots! They are very well made, comfortable, and warm. I liked them so much I bought them in two different colors.
customer_reviews.author: D. Youatt

customer_reviews.title: Great cute snow boot
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Not too tall, mid-calf height. Not too stiff as they are sayin with a rubber base. Nice rubber nonslip sole. Very cute and stylish with good snow boot function. Gots lots of compliments my first day out with them!
customer_reviews.author: JDeck

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and warm
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Very comfortable to wear. Still waiting for a large amount of snow to try them out in to see how waterproof they are. I live in the Chicago area. They definitely keep my feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking boot with great tread! Love the side zipper, really helps with tucking your pants into them.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I really like my boots and receive compliments every time I wear ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like my boots and receive compliments every time I wear them. The zipper is really a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: knel

customer_reviews.title: True to size, comfort and warmth
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has Sickle Cell Anemia and keeping warm is of outmost importance during this time of the year. As they arrived she did not hesitate, immediately placing them on her feet, her eyes told the rest of the story. Great look, comfortable and warm Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lucita Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice boots, good quality. I have another pair of Baretraps boots in the same size that fit me great, compared to those these are about 3/4" longer. I have a wide foot and these have plenty of room without squishing my feet. I could go down a half a size but I don't want to bother returning.
customer_reviews.author: thoughtBUBBLES

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Wore these all over Ireland. My feet were dry and comfortable. I wear an 8, fit perfect, not too snug. I have higher arches, great arch support. I recommend scotchgard before you wear, keep them nice.
customer_reviews.author: Atom

customer_reviews.title: When they came I checked to see the size since they looked smaller than expected which ended up being a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: My size was not available so I ordered a half size up thinking I could wear a thick sock. When they came I checked to see the size since they looked smaller than expected which ended up being a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feel warm ans fit as expected.
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit as expected and are really warm. Easy to out on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Fern

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and ray to put on with zipper for n the side
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Knock off—not the real Maxboost Screen Protector for Apple.
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector is a knock off. It is not the brand name.
customer_reviews.author: D. Silver

product_meta.title: BareTraps Women's Satin Snow Boot, Mud, 6 M US
product_meta.description: The BareTraps satin is a water resistant suede leather cold weather boot. it features warm shearling fabric linings for softness and comfort, combined with a lace up detail and inner zipper for easy adjustments.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately knee-high from arch
